name: Powercreep
description:
Powercreep is a tower defence game  in which the map grows. 

How to play:

Protect the core from the enemies spawed by spawners (the black swirly things) by building towers. Towers cost energy which is generated by generators. Generators generate power for each ground tile in their influence radius. Buildings can only be placed in the power field of generators (or the core). Additionally, towers can only be placed on tiles with a socket on them. Spawners spawn stronger enemies over time. To prevent them from overwhelming the defences, spawners can be destroyed by placing a generator close to one. Destroying some spawners makes the map expand. Survive as long as possible and get a new highscore. 

Controls: 

  • WASD - Camera movement
  • 1234 - Select building types
  • LMB - Build / Select
  • RMB - Cancel Build / Deselect
